t: Psalm 145
A psalm of praise. Of David.
I*pn will exalt you, my God the King; I*ld will praise your name for ever and ever.
Every*ln day I will praise you and*ld extol your name for ever and ever.
Great*pn is the Lord*s and most worthy of praise; his*ld greatness no one can fathom.
One*ln generation commends your works to another; they*ld tell of your mighty acts.
They*ln speak of the glorious splendor of your majesty— and*ld I will meditate on your wonderful works.
They*ln tell of the power of your awesome works— and*ld I will proclaim your great deeds.
They*ln celebrate your abundant goodness and*ld joyfully sing of your righteousness.
The*pn Lord*s is gracious and compassionate, slow*ld to anger and rich in love.
The*pn Lord*s is good to all; he*ld has compassion on all he has made.
All*ln your works praise you, Lord;*s your*ld faithful people extol you.
They*ln tell of the glory of your kingdom and*ld speak of your might,
so*ln that all people may know of your mighty acts and*ld the glorious splendor of your kingdom.
Your*ln kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and*ld your dominion endures through all generations. The*pn Lord*s is trustworthy in all he promises and*ld faithful in all he does.
The*ln Lord*s upholds all who fall and*ld lifts up all who are bowed down.
The*ln eyes of all look to you, and*ld you give them their food at the proper time.

The*pn Lord*s is righteous in all his ways and*ld faithful in all he does.
The*ln Lord*s is near to all who call on him, to*ld all who call on him in truth.
He*ln fulfills the desires of those who fear him; he*ld hears their cry and saves them.
The*ln Lord*s watches over all who love him, but*ld all the wicked he will destroy.
My*pn mouth will speak in praise of the Lord.*s Let*ld every creature praise his holy name for*ld ever and ever.
